meanings.definition: People who do not have diabetes.
meanings.sent1: Many nondiabetics enjoy a diet rich in fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's office had separate waiting areas for diabetics and nondiabetics.
meanings.sent3: At the sugar-free bakery, the nondiabetics joked about sneaking a bite of a sugary treat.
meanings.sent4: In a world of sweets, nondiabetics are the guardians of healthy eating habits.
meanings.sent5: The nondiabetics in the group were the first to finish the hike up the mountain.

meanings.definition: Not relating to or affected by diabetes.
meanings.sent1: The nondiabetics group had a potluck with dishes suitable for all dietary needs.
meanings.sent2: The nondiabetics section of the research focused on lifestyle factors.
meanings.sent3: The nondiabetics party had a cake that was sugar-free but still delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a nondiabetics' blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent5: The nondiabetics' energy levels were envied by all at the gym.
